typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Data Flow ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Code Revision} as string,
		{Data Flow Timestamp} as string,
		{Data Flow From System} as string,
		{Data Flow From System ID} as string,
		{Data Flow To System} as string,
		{Data Flow To System ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Link Description} as string,
		{Data Flow Link ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Link Type} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sort(asc({Data Flow Link Description}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 filter({Data Flow Link Description}!="041 - TMSInvalidMessage") ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		{Data Flow ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Code Revision} as string,
		{Data Flow Timestamp} as string,
		{Data Flow From System} as string,
		{Data Flow From System ID} as string,
		{Data Flow To System} as string,
		{Data Flow To System ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Link Description} as string,
		{Data Flow Link ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Link Type} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		{Business Application ID} as string,
		{Business Application Number} as string,
		{Business Application Name} as string,
		{Business Application Description} as string,
		{Business Application Criticality} as string,
		{Business Application Life Cycle Stage} as string,
		{Business Application Class Name} as string,
		{Business Application Data Classification} as string,
		{Business Application Life Cycle Stage Status} as string,
		{Business Application Contract Manager Name} as string,
		{Business Application Contract End Date} as timestamp,
		{Business Application Certified} as boolean,
		{Business Application Emergency Tier} as string,
		{Business Application Cat2 Classified} as boolean,
		{Business Application Operational Status} as integer,
		{Business Application Install Type} as string,
		{Business Application Domain} as string,
		{Business Application Install Status} as integer,
		{Business Application Business Process} as string,
		{Business Application Created Date} as timestamp,
		{Business Application Created_by Name} as string,
		{Business Application Updated Date} as timestamp,
		{Business Application Updated by Name} as string,
		{Business Application Business Owner ID} as string,
		{Business Application Vendor ID} as string,
		{Business Application Support Vendor ID} as string,
		{Business Application Company ID} as string,
		{Business Application Department ID} as string,
		{Business Application IT Application Owner ID} as string,
		{Business Application ISO ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> businessapplicationsource
source(output(
		{User ID} as string,
		{User Name} as string,
		{User Full Name} as string,
		{User First Name} as string,
		{User Last Name} as string,
		{User Email} as string,
		{User Title} as string,
		{User Department} as string,
		{User Employee Number} as string,
		{User Mobile Phone Number} as string,
		{User Phone} as string,
		{User Company} as string,
		{User Active Flag} as boolean,
		{User Location} as string,
		{User City} as string,
		{User Street Name} as string,
		{User Zip Code} as string,
		{User Manager ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> usersource
source(output(
		{Company ID} as string,
		{Company Name} as string,
		{Company Street} as string,
		{Company Phone} as string,
		{Company City} as string,
		{Company Class Name } as string,
		{Company sys_created_on_value} as timestamp,
		{Company sys_created_by_value} as string,
		{Company sys_updated_by_value} as string,
		{Company sys_updated_on_value} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> companysource
source(output(
		{Department ID} as string,
		{Department Name} as string,
		{Company ID} as string,
		{Department Description} as string,
		{Department Created Date} as timestamp,
		{Department Created by Name} as string,
		{Department Updated Date} as timestamp,
		{Department Updated by Name} as string,
		ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> departmentsource
source(output(
		{Business Process ID} as string,
		{Business Process Name} as string,
		{Business Process Class Name} as string,
		{Business Process Owned by} as string,
		{Business Process Install Status} as string,
		{Business Process Category} as string,
		{Business Process Operational Status} as string,
		{Business Process Subcategory} as string,
		{Business Process Impact to Availability} as string,
		{Business Process Business Crit Declared} as string,
		{Business Process Impact to Confidentiality} as string,
		{Business Process Impact to Integrity} as string,
		{Business Process Business Crit Determined} as string,
		{Business Process Business Life Cycle Stage} as string,
		{Business Process Business Life Cycle Stage Status} as string,
		{Business Process Business Cat2 Classified} as string,
		{Business Process Model ID} as string,
		{Business Process Created Date} as string,
		{Business Process Created by Name} as string,
		{Business Proces Updated Date} as string,
		{Business Proces Updated by Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> businessprocesssource
businessapplicationsource, usersource join({Business Application Business Owner ID} == {User ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select1, companysource join({Business Application Company ID} == {Company ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{Business Application ID},
		{Business Application Number},
		{Business Application Name},
		{Business Application Description},
		{Business Application Criticality},
		{Business Application Life Cycle Stage},
		{Business Application Class Name},
		{Business Application Data Classification},
		{Business Application Life Cycle Stage Status},
		{Business Application Contract Manager Name},
		{Business Application Contract End Date},
		{Business Application Certified},

		{Business Application Business Process},
		{Business Application Created Date},
		{Business Application Created_by Name},
		{Business Application Updated Date},
		{Business Application Updated by Name},
		{Business Application Business Owner ID},
		{Business Application Vendor ID},
		{Business Application Support Vendor ID},
		{Business Application Company ID},
		{Business Application Department ID},
		{Business Application IT Application Owner ID},
		{Business Application Owner User Name} = {User Name},
		{Business Application Owner User Full Name} = {User Full Name},
		{Business Application Owner Email} = {User Email},
		{Business Application Owner Mobile Phone Number} = {User Mobile Phone Number},
		{Business Application Owner Company} = {User Company},
		{Business Application ISO ID}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		{Business Application ID},
		{Business Application Number},
		{Business Application Name},
		{Business Application Description},

		{Business Application Life Cycle Stage},

		{Business Application Updated Date},

		{Business Application Business Owner ID},
		{Business Application Vendor ID},
		{Business Application Support Vendor ID},
		{Business Application Company ID},
		{Business Application Department ID},
		{Business Application IT Application Owner ID},
		{Business Application Owner User Name},
		{Business Application Owner User Full Name},
		{Business Application Owner Email},
		{Business Application Owner Mobile Phone Number},
		{Business Application Owner Company},
		{Business Application Company Name} = {Company Name},
		{Business Application ISO ID}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2, departmentsource join({Business Application Department ID} == {Department ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		{Business Application ID},
		{Business Application Number},
		{Business Application Name},
		{Business Application Description},
		{Business Application Criticality},
		{Business Application Life Cycle Stage},
		{Business Application Class Name},

		{Business Application Business Process},
		{Business Application Created Date},

Select3, usersource join({Business Application IT Application Owner ID} == {User ID},

Select5, usersource join({Business Application Process Owned by} == {User ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join6

		{Business Application Owner Email} as string,
		{Business Application Owner Mobile Phone Number} as string,

		{Business Application Process Owner Company} as string,

	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,

	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE [dbo].[fact Business Application]'],

		{Business Application Support Vendor ID},

		{Business Application Owner Mobile Phone Number},
		{Business Application Owner Company Name} = {Business Application Owner Company},
		{IT Application Owner User Name},
		{IT Application Owner Full Name},
		{IT Application Owner Email},
		{IT Application Owner Department},
		{IT Application Owner Mobile Phone Number},
		{IT Application Owner Company Name} = {IT Application Owner Company},
		{Business Application Process Name},
		{Business Application Process Owner User Name},
		{Business Application Process Owner Full Name},
		{Business Application Process Owner Email},
		{Business Application Process Owner Department},
		{Business Application Process Owner Mobile Phone Number},
		{Business Application Process Owner Company},

		{Business Application Contract Manager Name},

		{Business Application ISO ID}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkfactbusinessapp
